Class CourseIndex

java.lang.Object
CourseIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CourseIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The class contains the details about all the indices for the courses available
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseIndex

      public CourseIndex​(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String courseSchool, java.lang.String courseCode, int courseAU, int vacancies, int maxStudents, int indexID, java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> lessonList, java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentWaitlist, java.util.ArrayList<Student> registeredStudents)
      This constructor defines an index
      Parameters:
      courseName - the full name of the course
      courseSchool - the school which offers the course
      courseCode - the course code
      courseAU - the number of Academic Units of the course
      vacancies - the number of vacancies currently available for the particular index
      maxStudents - the maximum number of students for the particular index
      indexID - the number that represents the index
      lessonList - the array list that contains the details of the lessons for the particular index
      studentWaitlist - a list of students who are in the waitlist for the particular index
      registeredStudents - a list of students who are registered for the particular index

    • sendEmail

      public static void sendEmail​(Student student, int addedIndex, java.lang.String courseCode)
      Sending a notification email to the student
      Parameters:
      student - the student that has just successfully registered for a new course
      addedIndex - the index that the student has registered for in the course
      courseCode - the course code that the student has registered for
